channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP HANA Extended Application Services
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP HANA Extended Application Services

item.title: CVE-2018-2377|2024-08-05T04:14:39.678Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: In SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, some general server statistics and status information could be retrieved by unauthorized users.

item.title: CVE-2018-2375|2024-08-05T04:14:39.702Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: In SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, a controller user who has SpaceAuditor authorization in a specific space could retrieve application environments within that space.

item.title: CVE-2018-2376|2024-08-05T04:14:39.746Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: In SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, a controller user who has SpaceAuditor authorization in a specific space could retrieve application environments within that space.

item.title: CVE-2018-2372|2024-08-05T04:14:39.581Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: A plain keystore password is written to a system log file in SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, which could endanger confidentiality of SSL communication.

item.title: CVE-2018-2373|2024-08-05T04:14:39.581Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: Under certain circumstances, a specific endpoint of the Controller's API could be misused by unauthenticated users to execute SQL statements that deliver information about system configuration in SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0.

item.title: CVE-2018-2378|2024-08-05T04:14:39.625Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: In SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, unauthorized users can read statistical data about deployed applications including resource consumption.

item.title: CVE-2018-2374|2024-08-05T04:14:39.762Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: In SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, a controller user who has SpaceAuditor authorization in a specific space could retrieve sensitive application data like service bindings within that space.

item.title: CVE-2018-2379|2024-08-05T04:14:39.757Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: In SAP HANA Extended Application Services, 1.0, an unauthenticated user could test if a given username is valid by evaluating error messages of a specific endpoint.
